attributes.review: I opened the app and all of a sudden this man popped out from the screen screaming at me to take off my clothes and have sex with him, otherwise he would sue me?! what?! This man is a RACIST RAPIST, seriously this app just advocates for a man who would rather cause war in our country to justify use of force than actually make a difference in this world in the name of progress. BE WARNED, if you download this app you might contract ignorance. Sorry. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: Horrid, repulsive, putrid, actual vomit.

attributes.review: This app almost matches up with how terrible the president is. It took at least 7 hours for this useless app to finally download on to my phone, just show how bad this app is. Even before downloading i was already disappointed. If there was an option to not give a star I WOULD!!! This app is so terrible, hopefully instead of an upgrade itâ€™s completely deleted off the face of the earth;)
attributes.title: Trump Trash

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and then my phone started glitching. I thought nothing of it until my phone completely shut off and then when I turned it back on I got a message saying that if I didnâ€™t send them 1 million dollars trumps secret agents would come after me and kill me! So I deleted the app and Iâ€™m working on getting 1 million so I can live. Wish me luck and never download this app!

My phone was glitching, crashing constantly, I began receiving questionable phone calls from USA numbers, and all of this while the app itself wouldnâ€™t even open! Trash! Awful! Do not waste your time and energy on this app or the little man himself!
